description: Non-material amendments as follows:1. Replacement of stepped brickwork with flush brickwork2. Window position set back3. Alterations to cills and parapet copings4. Reduce extent of curtain walling5. Omit brick cladding to projecting balconies6. Regularise shapes of balconies and amend size of certain balconies7. Consolidate number of individual windows8. Alterations to rooftop of SW01 including changes to form of overrun and replacement of louvre cladding with brickwork9. Reduction in number of PV panels on the SW07 rooftop10. Alterations to doors and fenestration at ground floor level on blocks SW01 and SW0211. Alterations to railings around SW01 and SW02 rooftopsof reserved matters application reference 18/0742 dated 06/07/2018, in relation to plots SW01/SW02/SW07 comprising the construction of three buildings ranging from 6 to 18 storeys in height, providing 156 residential units (affordable rent and shared ownership), with ground floor units in retail/commercial/community use (use classes A1-A4, B1, D1 and D2) and a permanent rail facility (use class B1) along with associated amenity space, car parking, cycle storage, plant and associated infrastructure.
site_name: Land Surrounding Wembley Stadium Station, South Way, Wembley
